description: Lists the commitments associated with a bill estimate.

parameters.name: billEstimateId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill estimate to list commitments for.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The list of commitments associated with the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the commitment.

nested_items.name: purchaseAgreementType
nested_items.description: The type of purchase agreement (e.g., Reserved Instance, Savings Plan).

nested_items.name: offeringId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the specific offering associated with this commitment.

nested_items.name: usageAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with this commitment.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services region associated with this commitment.

nested_items.name: termLength
nested_items.description: The length of the commitment term.

nested_items.name: paymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option chosen for this commitment (e.g., All Upfront, Partial Upfront, No Upfront).

nested_items.name: upfrontPayment
nested_items.description: The upfront payment amount for this commitment, if applicable.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: monthlyPayment
nested_items.description: The monthly payment amount for this commitment, if applicable.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to retrieve the next page of results, if any.
